DOC.brief_summary: The study assess duration protection single dose 2 different long act muscarinic antagonist methacholine induce bronchoconstriction .
DOC.brief_title: Duration Long Acting Muscarinic Antagonist ( LAMA ) Bronchoprotection Against Methacholine Challenge
DOC.criteria: male female asthmatic > 19 year age baseline methacholine PC20 le equal 4mg/ml baseline lung function > 65 % predict nonsmoker less 10 pack year smoke history use anticholinergic within 30 day Visit 1 poorly control asthma pregnant nursing respiratory illness within 4 week Visit 1 exposure agent trigger asthma worsening ( e.g . allergen ) within 4 week Visit 1
